content:
# The stone furnace is successfully placed and fueled with 5 units of coal. However, it currently has no ingredients to smelt, which means I need to gather iron ore to start the smelting process.

# Step 8: Locate the nearest iron ore resource and move there.
iron_ore_position = nearest(Resource.IronOre)
move_to(iron_ore_position)  # Move to the position of iron ore resources.

# Step 9: Harvest iron ore.
harvest_resource(iron_ore_position, quantity=10)  # Harvest 10 units of iron ore to smelt into iron plates.

print(f"Inventory after harvesting iron ore: {inspect_inventory()}")
